books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: A video of a shocking crime surfaces, casting suspicion on a San Francisco detective's colleagues.
books.name: 14TH DEADLY SIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport is on the trail of killers who have targeted a group of vagabonds called the Travelers.
books.name: GATHERING PREY

books.author: by Lincoln Child
books.description: Probing a death, the “enigmatologist” Jeremy Logan discovers a hidden room at a Newport estate where a dangerous experiment took place. A sequel to “The Third Gate.”
books.name: THE FORGOTTEN ROOM

books.author: by Craig Johnson
books.description: Sheriff Walt Longmire of Absaroka County, Wyo., investigates the death of a Cheyenne rancher on whose property a valuable dinosaur skeleton was found. The basis of the series “Longmire.”
books.name: DRY BONES

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful New York magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed during the filming of a documentary about a shooting at the prestigious high school she attended.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Jeffery Deaver
books.description: Kathryn Dance of the California Bureau of Investigation takes on a killer scaring people into causing their own deaths.
books.name: SOLITUDE CREEK

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman returning to her hometown discovers that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
books.description: A couple attempt to unpack the past in a series's second installment.
books.name: NEVER NEVER

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: An English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Daunted by Christian’s dark secrets, Anastasia ends their relationship — but desire still dominates her every thought.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by Steve Martini
books.description: A defense attorney teases out a trail of corruption connected to a high-powered lawyer's death.
books.name: THE ENEMY INSIDE
